data.title: Tavares, FL - Official Website
data.text:
On the first Saturday of every December, the sights and sounds of Christmas take over Downtown Tavares. It all begins at 5:30 PM with our Christmas parade. followed by plenty of fun, activities and holiday cheer to put you in the Christmas spirit. Enjoy live entertainment, "ice" skating, photo op spots, snow storms, giant Christmas tree, movie in the park, food vendors, and much more. Don't forget the highlight of the evening, visits from Santa!

Join us for the sights and sounds of Christmas on Saturday, December 7, 2024 starting at 5:30 pm for another Fantastic Christmas Celebration!

2023 PARADE WINNERS:

Best Theme: City of Tavares Wastewater

Most Creative: Babe Ruth Booster Club

Best Youth: Tri-City Dance Twirlers

Best Float: JPPL of Central Florida

Best Overall: Lowe's of Mount Dora

Honorable Mention: Family Pawn

Most Generous (toys): JPPL of Central Florida
